huml_site.title: UCSB Center for the Humanities and Machine Learning (HUML) Website
huml_site.desc: As a graduate student researcher, I designed the website for UC Santa Barbara's Center for the Humanities and Machine Learning. Visit to see upcoming events, recent publications, and more.

g2c.title: Ground to Cloud: A Gallery of AI Infrastructure
g2c.banner_alt: screenshot of a web page showing text and an image of a mining complex
g2c.desc: Ground to Cloud (G2C) brings together scholarly research and investigative journalism on the vast array of infrastructure that supports contemporary artificial intelligence, with a focus on specific sites and forms of labor.

huml_report.title: Report: The 2024 Critical AI Funding Landscape
huml_report.banner_alt: a screenshot of text on a web page
huml_report.desc: This report, prepared by graduate researcher Owen Leonard, provides an overview of Critical Artificial Intelligence funding in the United States—from major academic research initiatives to community-center workshops—and offers recommendations for researchers to maximize relevance and impact.

chronicling.title: Chronicling America Utilities
chronicling.banner_alt: a screenshot of the Chronicling America homepage on loc.gov
chronicling.desc: This open-source repository contains modules that provide automated access to the Chronicling America database of historical newspapers.
